snippet: The network's results were a 5 percent increase over the same period last year and the highest second quarter since it was established as a separate entity from Viacom six years ago.
abstract: The network's results were a 5 percent increase over the same period last year and the highest second quarter since it was established as a separate entity from Viacom six years ago.

headline.main: CBS Reports Rise in Operating Income for Second Quarter
headline.print_headline: CBS Profit Sets Quarterly Record, Though TV Revenue Falls
